Reviews.Title: Very good phone
Reviews.Author: Robert D. Mcgovern "Smart Gal"
Reviews.Content: I ordered two of these phones, Samsung Galaxy Fascinate SCH-I500 and have been very pleased and impressed with the phones.  Very good value and very good product.

Reviews.Title: WOw,,,what a phone!
Reviews.Author: Robert Valdes
Reviews.Content: Phone is perfect.Arrived in well designed box (as shown) with USB, phone, and battery.Charged the battery and currently using as my Verizon no-contract phone.Given the price of the phone, I will be able to buy a phone every year and still save $100'scompared to buying new. Worthy of note, phone covers and SD cards for this are inexpensive.Will do business again.
